messages.title: Leading the fight to stop the Conservatives’ HARD Brexit
messages.content: A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket across the country - with the poorest families hit hardest. We need to protect jobs, by keeping Britain in the single market and having a real alternative to the Conservatives. Amongst the main parties in England, only the Liberal Democrats are challenging the Conservatives over their hard Brexit plans. Labour are deeply divided and fail to give a clear lead on Europe. ONLY A LIBERAL DEMOCRAT VOTE CAN GET REAL CHANGE FOR BRITAIN.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop the Conservatives' hard Brexit by keeping Britain in the single market. Protect jobs and offer a real alternative to the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket across the country. We need to protect jobs, by keeping Britain in the single market and having a real alternative to the Conservatives.

politicalExperience.achievements: Actively involved in schools and health services.

endorsements.endorsement: Petrol prices at the pumps are now rising steadily, with around two-thirds of the rises due to Brexit. A hard Brexit could result in the pound dropping further, causing even dearer petrol prices.

quotes.text: Petrol prices at the pumps are now rising steadily, with around two-thirds of the rises due to Brexit.

images.caption: Petrol prices rising due to Brexit.
